thread.title: Yahoo chief Mayer says she's pregnant with twins

author: chron.com
title: Yahoo chief Mayer says she's pregnant with twins
text:

gallery_thumbnails_show|article-gallery-6477692|article-gallery-6477692|0 gallery_overlay_open|article-gallery-6477692|article-gallery-6477692|0 gallery_overlay_open_thumbs|article-gallery-6477692|article-gallery-6477692|0 Image 1 of 1 FILE - In this Wednesday, Jan. 22, 2014, file photo, Yahoo CEO Marissa Mayer smiles during a session at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland. Mayer posted on Tumblr, Monday, Aug. 31, 2015, that she's pregnant with twin girls, due in December.
Photo: Michel Euler, AP FILE - In this Wednesday, Jan. 22, 2014, file photo, Yahoo CEO... Yahoo chief Mayer says she's pregnant with twins 1 / 1 Back to Gallery gallery_thumbs_close|article-gallery-6477692|article-gallery-6477692|0 gallery_overlay_close|article-gallery-6477692|article-gallery-6477692|0 SAN FRANCISCO (AP) â€” Yahoo CEO Marissa Mayer says she's pregnant with identical twins.
Mayer says on a posting on her blog that she and her husband are expecting the twin girls in December.
"I have some exciting news to share - I'm pregnant!" she says on her Tumblr posting Monday night.
She says that she will take some limited time away but work during the pregnancy as she did with her son's birth three years ago.
Mayer says that she's informed Yahoo executives of her pregnancy.
Three years ago, Mayer announced she was pregnant with her son on her social networking accounts just a few hours after Yahoo hired her as its third full-time CEO in less than a year.
